item.title: Erotic plasticity
item.description: How fluid is our sense of the erotic? Like neurological plasticity, probably a lot more fluid than we think. Per [[authors/jesse bering|Jesse Bering]], in [[books/perv|Perv]]: Whether it involves livestock or people, this sexual-imprinting process (in which a highly circumscribed set of erotic targets is stamped early into the individualâ€™s brain) appears to be a decidedly male characteristic.
